LanguageData.CyberneticAvaliTail.label: cybernetic Avali tail
LanguageData.CyberneticAvaliTail.description: Not just a long metal rod, it has a plethora of stabilisation hardware and software, making an avali as agile and nimble as a cat.
LanguageData.CyberneticAvaliBody.label: cybernetic Avali body
LanguageData.CyberneticAvaliBody.description: A technological marvel! Every organ is replaced with a mechanical counterpart which is three times smaller, leaving plenty of space for metabolism and vitality increasing hardware, this is as close an avali will ever get to being a terminator.
LanguageData.CyberneticAvaliHead.label: cybernetic Avali head
LanguageData.CyberneticAvaliHead.description: A perverbial "Brain in a jar". Except this jar has a a whole suite of sensors, stabilisers, supercomputers is made out of plasteel and is fully self-sufficient.
LanguageData.CyberneticAvaliLeg.label: cybernetic Avali leg
LanguageData.CyberneticAvaliLeg.description: Avali leg replica with sophisticated pneumatics and hydraulics, greatly increasing its recipient's agility. No more leg day!
LanguageData.CyberneticAvaliArm.label: cybernetic Avali arm
LanguageData.CyberneticAvaliArm.description: Avali arm replica with gyroscopic stabilisation, advanced predictive algorythms and advanced hydraulics. It also looks freaking cool.
LanguageData.TailAvali.label: Avali tail
LanguageData.ClothAvaliTail.label: cloth Avali tail
LanguageData.ClothAvaliTail.description: A simple replacement made out of cloth. At least it feels like there's something.
LanguageData.ClothAvaliEar.label: cloth Avali ear
LanguageData.ClothAvaliEar.description: A simple replacement made out of cloth. At least it feels like there's something.
